alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:05PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Thunderstorms This Evening... Strong thunderstorms are occurring along the Dalton Highway and will continue until about midnight tonight. The storms could move over the Prudhoe Bay and Point Thompson area in the next several hours. Frequent lightning, brief heavy rain, winds gusting to 30 mph, and hail are expected. Rapid rises on creeks and small rivers may occur. People should seek protection from lightning and hail by getting inside a vehicle if possible. If no vehicle is available, then getting under some type of shelter with no metal poles is best. Metal objects should be avoided while lightning is occuring.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range
